Don’t stop working.\""},{"lineNumber":16145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ、了解っ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, understood!\""},{"lineNumber":16146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっふっふ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh heh."},{"lineNumber":16147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうせなら手本でも見せてやろうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since we're at it, shall I show you a demonstration?\""},{"lineNumber":16148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手本？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A demonstration?\""},{"lineNumber":16149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。腕の立つ奴に一本、稽古でも付けてやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. Volunteers?\""},{"lineNumber":16158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ、じゃあ、いいんですかい？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Well, is that alright? Should I be your opponent...?\""},{"lineNumber":16159,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっしがお相手を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll fight you...\""},{"lineNumber":16160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいぞ。全力で来い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fine. Give it your all.\""},{"lineNumber":16161,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":16162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もし勝ったらボーナスを出す。本気でやれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you win, you'll get a bonus. That sounds about right for a mercenary."},{"lineNumber":16166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっさと掛かってこい」","translatedEnglishLine":" Hurry up and come at me.\""},{"lineNumber":16167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へえ。それじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh. Chest—attack!\""},{"lineNumber":16170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、うおおぉっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oooh!?\""},{"lineNumber":16171,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh.\""},{"lineNumber":16172,"originalJapaneseLine":"不意討ち気味の一撃を傭兵は防いだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The mercenary blocked the sudden strike,"},{"lineNumber":16173,"originalJapaneseLine":"体勢が崩れた。","translatedEnglishLine":" but his stance was disrupted."},{"lineNumber":16174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ッりゃーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-hiyaaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":16175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、ぬぐくっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gg, ughk...!\""},{"lineNumber":16176,"originalJapaneseLine":"重い一撃で翻弄し、虚を突いて胸板に蹴り込み……","translatedEnglishLine":"With a heavy blow confusing him, he struck an opening and kicked his chest..."},{"lineNumber":16177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……まいった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... I give up...\""},{"lineNumber":16178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、しょーーーーーり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, victory!\""},{"lineNumber":16179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ−、おめでとうございます、ランス様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, congratulations, Lord Rance!"},{"lineNumber":16180,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぱちぱちぱちー」","translatedEnglishLine":"*clap clap clap*\""},{"lineNumber":16181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":16182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、どうだセシル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, how is it, Cecil?"},{"lineNumber":16183,"originalJapaneseLine":"参考になったか？　惚れたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did you learn something? Are you impressed?\""},{"lineNumber":16184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………一同。今のは……悪い見本だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Everyone. That was... a bad example.\""},{"lineNumber":16185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、なんでじゃーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Why is that!\""},{"lineNumber":16186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「足の運びも適当、剣も力任せ。型もなにもない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"His footwork is careless, his sword is used with brute force. There's no form at all."},{"lineNumber":16187,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統が強いのは……なんというか……","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason the Supreme Commander is strong is... how should I put it...\""},{"lineNumber":16188,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルは一度口を閉ざして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil closed her mouth briefly,"},{"lineNumber":16189,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の言葉を探し…………","translatedEnglishLine":" searching for the right words..."},{"lineNumber":16190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……何かの間違いだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It must be some kind of mistake.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元は冒険者で、かなり腕が立つって話だぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was originally an adventurer and is said to be quite skilled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちと変わらねぇじゃねぇか」
どうせなら手本でも見せてやろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we're at it, shall I show you a demonstration?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。腕の立つ奴に一本、稽古でも付けてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. I’ll give a lesson to someone skilled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルに恩を売ってやるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and earn some favor with Cecil.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やりすぎちゃだめですよ、ランス様……」
総統閣下が戦いの手本として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander will give a demonstration of battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 訓練を付けてくださるそうだ。誰か！」
「じゃ、じゃあ、いいんですかい？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Well, is that alright? Should I be your opponent...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もし勝ったらボーナスを出す。本気でやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you win, you'll get a bonus. Do your best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおぉぉっ！？　マジですかい！
それなら悪いがやらせていただきやすぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I’ll gladly take you on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。そこら辺は傭兵らしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. That sounds about right for a mercenary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと掛かってこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up and come at me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　ちぇすとーーーー！」
不意討ち気味の一撃を傭兵は防いだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mercenary blocked the sudden strike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重い一撃で翻弄し、虚を突いて胸板に蹴り込み……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a heavy blow confusing him, he struck an opening and kicked his chest...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、しょーーーーーり！」
「わ−、おめでとうございます、ランス様！
参考になったか？　惚れたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you learn something? Are you impressed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「足の運びも適当、剣も力任せ。型もなにもない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His footwork is careless, his sword is used with brute force. There's no form at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統が強いのは……なんというか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason the Supreme Commander is strong is... how should I put it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは一度口を閉ざして、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It must be some kind of mistake."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元は冒険者で、かなり腕が立つって話だぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was originally an adventurer and is said to be quite skilled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちと変わらねぇじゃねぇか」
どうせなら手本でも見せてやろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we're at it, shall I show you a demonstration?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。腕の立つ奴に一本、稽古でも付けてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. I’ll give a lesson to someone skilled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルに恩を売ってやるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and earn some favor with Cecil.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やりすぎちゃだめですよ、ランス様……」
総統閣下が戦いの手本として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander will give a demonstration of battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 訓練を付けてくださるそうだ。誰か！」
「じゃ、じゃあ、いいんですかい？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Well, is that alright? Should I be your opponent...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もし勝ったらボーナスを出す。本気でやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you win, you'll get a bonus. Do your best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおぉぉっ！？　マジですかい！
それなら悪いがやらせていただきやすぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I’ll gladly take you on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。そこら辺は傭兵らしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. That sounds about right for a mercenary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと掛かってこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up and come at me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　ちぇすとーーーー！」
不意討ち気味の一撃を傭兵は防いだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mercenary blocked the sudden strike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重い一撃で翻弄し、虚を突いて胸板に蹴り込み……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a heavy blow confusing him, he struck an opening and kicked his chest...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、しょーーーーーり！」
「わ−、おめでとうございます、ランス様！
参考になったか？　惚れたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you learn something? Are you impressed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「足の運びも適当、剣も力任せ。型もなにもない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His footwork is careless, his sword is used with brute force. There's no form at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統が強いのは……なんというか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason the Supreme Commander is strong is... how should I put it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは一度口を閉ざして、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It must be some kind of mistake."
